noun.description: A person who manages or looks after something or someone.
examples: I'm your friend, not your keeper

noun.description: A fish large enough to be kept when caught.
A plain ring worn to keep a more valuable one on the finger.
A bar of soft iron placed across the poles of a horseshoe magnet to maintain its strength.
A food or drink that remains in a specified condition if stored.
A play in which the quarterback runs with the ball instead of handing it off or passing it.
